text: Aur main us taleem o hidayat ki tasdeeq karne wala bankar aaya hoon jo Taurat mein se is waqt mere zamane mein maujood hai, aur isliye aaya hoon ke tumhare liye baaz un cheezon ko halal kardoon jo tumpar haraam kardi gayi hain. Dekho main tumhare Rubb ki taraf se tumhare paas nishani lekar aaya hoon , lihaza Allah se daro aur meri itaat karo
